scripts.build: rm -Rf dist/ && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs node_modules/marked/lib/marked.js src/matrix-live.js -c --lint -o dist/matrix-live-min.js && ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs src/matrix-live-generate.js -c --lint -o dist/matrix-live-generate-min.js && cp -r assets/* dist && cp README.md CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cd dist/ && zip -r matrix-live.zip *
